data.question: What is the chemical formula of trans-Co6Se8(PPh3)4(CO)2?
What is the space group of [NBu4]4[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
What method was used for the synthesis of trans-Co6Se8(PPh3)4(CO)2?
data.answer: Heating a solution of Co2(CO)8, Se, and triphenylphosphine in toluene.

data.question: Is the compound [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] air-sensitive?
What is the role of CoBr2 in the formation of [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
What technique was used to obtain the cyclic voltammetry of [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
data.answer: Sonicating crystals in a solution of 0.1 M [NBu4][PF6] in acetonitrile.

data.question: Is the compound [NBu4]3[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] soluble in water?
What is the formula weight of [trans-Co6Se8(PPh3)4(CO)2][PF6]?
How was the exfoliation of [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] achieved?
data.answer: By mechanically exfoliating using Scotch Magic™ tape.

data.question: What was the result of blue-light induced ligand substitution on exfoliated flakes of [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
Does the compound [NBu4]4[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] contain chlorine?
What is the crystallographic space group of trans-Co6Se8(PPh3)4(CO)2?
What was the method used for the synthesis of [NBu4]3[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] from trans-Co6Se8(PPh3)4(CO)2?
data.answer: Thermal substitution with tetrabutylammonium cyanide followed by oxidation.

data.question: Was bromine detected in the EDS spectrum of a single crystal of [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
What was the purpose of using ferrocenium hexafluorophosphate in the synthesis of [NBu4]3[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
What was observed in the AFM images after functionalization of exfoliated [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] with CNAB?
data.answer: Dissolution of tape residue and appearance of small extra particles.

data.question: Is the compound [NBu4]4[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2] paramagnetic?
What was the result of the dark ligand substitution control experiment on exfoliated flakes of [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
data.answer: Very weak CNAB Raman peaks, suggesting minimal binding through thermal substitution.

data.question: What was the role of sodium tetraphenylborate in the synthesis of “[Na]3[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]”?
data.answer: To exchange tetrabutylammonium ions with sodium ions for water solubility.

data.question: What was the purpose of using a 456 nm Kessil lamp in the functionalization of exfoliated flakes of [Co(py)4]2[trans-Co6Se8(CN)4(CO)2]?
data.answer: To induce the photoinduced exchange of CO for CNAB.
